__e: And were you in jail for six months for beating a man?
I saw the kid who got stabbed and died like two months ago.
And the first time I beat up a boy... he was trying to hurt my brother, so I went and I jumped, and I just, like...
Cos he's been hit on the head by somebody once a day, every day.
Like, you're some guy who would never hit a woman, ya know.
He belted me one, all because of his half-caste little brother.
You hit your head; you're in the hospital.
Did I hit my head or something?
You lost your right to be a father when you beat your children's mother.
I got a guy who beats his wife's face in, in front of their kid, and the next day he's back home.
When you got beat up last night, did that have anything to do with me?
It's not him who beat up my dad!
That, the day before, They beat up their son because he was gay.
Our kid picked up a stick, hit your kid. - That's why we're here.
- I'm sorry was... - You beat my son to death?
He beat his three-year-old son to death.
Yeah, but he was beaten to death right after we dropped him off at his house.
I probably should've told you I saw her take the phone, but you'd beat me up, Jack.
Well, he said that if I didn't ask him not to that he would beat the shit out of me.
He said nothing but beated you up?
Yeah, but he was beaten to death right after we dropped him off at his house.
He said nothing but beated you up?
Well, he said that if I didn't ask him not to that he would beat the shit out of me.
Well, I didn't hit him, and I think that's the most important thing.
You don't know what it's like to know that your son is being hurt and there's nothing you can do to stop it. - You cannot keep this child on the run.
And the fact that you haven't battered me right now, is because they're not round here to see you being taken apart.
